    Methods in SystemEnvironment with parameters of type PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Core.setLocalSchedAlgorithm(PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm a)
    Installs a local priority-driven scheduling algorithm for this core.
    void
    Processor.setSchedAlgorithm(PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm a)
    Installs the priority-driven scheduling algorithm and wires it to either the global scheduler or per-core schedulers depending on the selected scheduling type.
    void
    Scheduler.setSchedAlgorithm(PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm a)
    Sets the scheduling algorithm that this facade delegates to.
